special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Tal Terig enters, each opponent discards two cards.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
At the beginning of your end step, each player mills a card.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
When this Expedition is defeated, return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.
